sqls.sql: SELECT NodeID, ParentID, NodeName, NodeDsc, RepeatNode, MapID, IDCode, SysTypeID, SubSysTypeID, NVal, KVal, NKType, RlVal, SwitchFr, IsWorkUnit, CCFactor, RBDCountType, RATCountType, DistTypeID, LamdaVal, MVal, GVal, GamaVal, MuVal, TiVal, AVal, BVal, RVal, RBase, AvaiVal, MTBFVal, MTBCFVal, MaintID, MDistTypeID, MMVal, MGVal, MGamaVal, MMuVal, MTiVal, MAVal, MBVal, MTTR, MissionTime, MethodID, Gama, Tao0, Z0, Nita1, Z1, Alfa, IsBfIn, ER1, ER2, RL, A0, Rd, DRd, R2, R3, ChildMapID, ChildMapType, RATTypeID, MT0, MR_fd, MR_fm, IsMOM FROM RBD_TreeNode WHERE NodeID=:NodeID

SELECT NodeID, ParentID, NodeName, NodeDsc, RepeatNode, MapID, IDCode, SysTypeID, SubSysTypeID, NVal, KVal, NKType, RlVal, SwitchFr, IsWorkUnit, CCFactor, RBDCountType, RATCountType, DistTypeID, LamdaVal, MVal, GVal, GamaVal, MuVal, TiVal, AVal, BVal, RVal, RBase, AvaiVal, MTBFVal, MTBCFVal, MaintID, MDistTypeID, MMVal, MGVal, MGamaVal, MMuVal, MTiVal, MAVal, MBVal, MTTR, MissionTime, MethodID, Gama, Tao0, Z0, Nita1, Z1, Alfa, IsBfIn, ER1, ER2, RL, A0, Rd, DRd, R2, R3, ChildMapID, ChildMapType, RATTypeID, MT0, MR_fd, MR_fm, IsMOM FROM RBD_TreeNode

INSERT INTO RBD_TreeNode (NodeID, ParentID, NodeName, NodeDsc, RepeatNode, MapID, IDCode, SysTypeID, SubSysTypeID, NVal, KVal, NKType, RlVal, SwitchFr, IsWorkUnit, CCFactor, RBDCountType, RATCountType, DistTypeID, LamdaVal, MVal, GVal, GamaVal, MuVal, TiVal, AVal, BVal, RVal, RBase, AvaiVal, MTBFVal, MTBCFVal, MaintID, MDistTypeID, MMVal, MGVal, MGamaVal, MMuVal, MTiVal, MAVal, MBVal, MTTR, MissionTime, MethodID, Gama, Tao0, Z0, Nita1, Z1, Alfa, IsBfIn, ER1, ER2, RL, A0, Rd, DRd, R2, R3, ChildMapID, ChildMapType, RATTypeID, MT0, MR_fd, MR_fm, IsMOM) VALUES (:NodeID, :ParentID, :NodeName, :NodeDsc, :RepeatNode, :MapID, :IDCode, :SysTypeID, :SubSysTypeID, :NVal, :KVal, :NKType, :RlVal, :SwitchFr, :IsWorkUnit, :CCFactor, :RBDCountType, :RATCountType, :DistTypeID, :LamdaVal, :MVal, :GVal, :GamaVal, :MuVal, :TiVal, :AVal, :BVal, :RVal, :RBase, :AvaiVal, :MTBFVal, :MTBCFVal, :MaintID, :MDistTypeID, :MMVal, :MGVal, :MGamaVal, :MMuVal, :MTiVal, :MAVal, :MBVal, :MTTR, :MissionTime, :MethodID, :Gama, :Tao0, :Z0, :Nita1, :Z1, :Alfa, :IsBfIn, :ER1, :ER2, :RL, :A0, :Rd, :DRd, :R2, :R3, :ChildMapID, :ChildMapType, :RATTypeID, :MT0, :MR_fd, :MR_fm, :IsMOM)

UPDATE RBD_TreeNode SET NodeID=:NodeID, ParentID=:ParentID, NodeName=:NodeName, NodeDsc=:NodeDsc, RepeatNode=:RepeatNode, MapID=:MapID, IDCode=:IDCode, SysTypeID=:SysTypeID, SubSysTypeID=:SubSysTypeID, NVal=:NVal, KVal=:KVal, NKType=:NKType, RlVal=:RlVal, SwitchFr=:SwitchFr, IsWorkUnit=:IsWorkUnit, CCFactor=:CCFactor, RBDCountType=:RBDCountType, RATCountType=:RATCountType, DistTypeID=:DistTypeID, LamdaVal=:LamdaVal, MVal=:MVal, GVal=:GVal, GamaVal=:GamaVal, MuVal=:MuVal, TiVal=:TiVal, AVal=:AVal, BVal=:BVal, RVal=:RVal, RBase=:RBase, AvaiVal=:AvaiVal, MTBFVal=:MTBFVal, MTBCFVal=:MTBCFVal, MaintID=:MaintID, MDistTypeID=:MDistTypeID, MMVal=:MMVal, MGVal=:MGVal, MGamaVal=:MGamaVal, MMuVal=:MMuVal, MTiVal=:MTiVal, MAVal=:MAVal, MBVal=:MBVal, MTTR=:MTTR, MissionTime=:MissionTime, MethodID=:MethodID, Gama=:Gama, Tao0=:Tao0, Z0=:Z0, Nita1=:Nita1, Z1=:Z1, Alfa=:Alfa, IsBfIn=:IsBfIn, ER1=:ER1, ER2=:ER2, RL=:RL, A0=:A0, Rd=:Rd, DRd=:DRd, R2=:R2, R3=:R3, ChildMapID=:ChildMapID, ChildMapType=:ChildMapType, RATTypeID=:RATTypeID, MT0=:MT0, MR_fd=:MR_fd, MR_fm=:MR_fm, IsMOM=:IsMOM WHERE NodeID=:NodeID
